summary:
Just replace the vanilla cursor with a Buster Sword Cursor thanks to Shigen2 screenshot from
his sword in his own mod the \"Buster Sword - Old type - Final Fantasy VII\"
descriptionHtml:
What this mod does ?

Just simply replace the vanilla cursor 
with a Buster Sword Cursor

thanks to Shigen2 screenshot from
his sword in his own mod the \"Buster Sword - Old type - Final Fantasy VII\"
Link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40084//?

oh and thanks to Square Enix and Bethesda for they awesome games

To install ?

Just drop the file inside skyrim\\Data\\Interface

and place the cursormenu.swf there if it ask to overwrite do it.

I recommand the install by using the NMM
author: mach1991
